sentences.sContent: Obesity correlates with increased risk for hypertension and stroke.
sentences.sCn: 过度肥胖与高血压和中风的发病风险增加密切相关。

sentences.sContent: ...which he calls the single strongest correlate of upward mobility...

phrases.pCn: 找出一一对应的关系；使…与…发生关系

remMethod.val: cor(共同) ＋ relate(相关) → 相关， 关联

words.tran: （使）相关联；（使）相互对照（correlate的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: if two or more facts, ideas etc correlate or if you correlate them, they are closely connected to each other or one causes the other
